abstract: The agreement revamps the rules for how companies collect and use online data, including social media posts, search queries and e-commerce purchases.
snippet: The agreement revamps the rules for how companies collect and use online data, including social media posts, search queries and e-commerce purchases.
lead_paragraph: American and European officials released details on Monday about a new trans-Atlantic data transfer agreement, prompting a new round of debate about how companies like Google move digital information between the two regions.

headline.main: E.U. and U.S. Release Details on Trans-Atlantic Data Transfer Deal
